title: Penance gloves

properties.name: description
properties.value: Penance gloves are members gloves obtained from the Barbarian Assault minigame, requiring 40 Defence to wear. Players with 150 honour points in each of the four roles can purchase the gloves by speaking to Commander Connad, located on the main floor of the Barbarian Outpost. Players do not have to kill the Penance Queen to obtain the gloves.

SMW Subobject for WornExamine: These gloves seem unbelieveably light![sic]Is members only: trueIs variant of: Penance glovesUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Penance gloves.pngWeight: -4.535Value: 65001Version anchor: WornRelease date: 4 January 2007Item ID: 10554

Penance gloves are members gloves obtained from the Barbarian Assault minigame, requiring 40 Defence to wear. Players with 150 honour points in each of the four roles can purchase the gloves by speaking to Commander Connad, located on the main floor of the Barbarian Outpost. Players do not have to kill the Penance Queen to obtain the gloves.

The penance gloves are one of only two weight-reducing items for the gloves slot, the second being graceful gloves which do not have requirements to wear. The penance gloves provide a higher weight reduction (-4.535 kg) than the graceful gloves (-3 kg), but do not provide increased run energy restoration rates where the graceful gloves have +3% by themselves, or +5% as a part of the Graceful outfit set effect. The penance gloves also provide defensive bonuses that are similar to iron gloves or steel gloves depending on the bonuses.

These gloves can be taken to Entrana.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
20 August â€“
2 October 2014

The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.

8 August 2013
(update)

Some feedback changes have been made to the config costs of the fire cape, rune defender and penance items, including the penance skirt.

2 August 2013
(update | poll)

The item's value was increased from 200 to 65,001 so it is protected over rune armour upon death.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.
